ygData.subject: Re: bard weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: PGT weights 6.5 and spear is at 5. Just asking because I also thought about these but I took them away from my wish list, because of the weight. The Jig is a
ygData.messageBody:
PGT weights 6.5 and spear is at 5. Just asking because I also thought about
these but I took them away from my wish list, because of the weight.
The Jig is a nice option but I'd rather play something else instead, that's
why I was asking. Well, one bubble doesn't seem too dramatic. :)

Thormael


PS : I think the spear is ok but 6.5 weight for a 6/26 weapon is way too
much for me. The effect of the PGT is nice but I'd take a dragoon dirk over
a PGT anyday (and well, that's waht I'm currently using, hehe).
